channel.title: Noooooooooooo, I have a run.bat issue D:
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "10887 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:146) at server.world.ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.(Server.java:65) Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .
^^ Quoted from when I run the file "run.bat" I recently edited a shop, then when I ran and saw that it said ShopHandler.java I immediately undid the change I made.... But it hasn't worked..... Any ideas? As I cannot loose this server to a error!

item.title: Noooooooooooo, I have a run.bat issue D:
item.dc:creator: @Blast0Scape Blast0Scape
item.description:
@Blast0Scape wrote:

Yeah i get this problem alot to, what i figured out to keep from it happened is,(if you are useing dementhium base) on item editor dont hit save & repack hit save then repack, on shop editor, dont add shops, lol for somereason those 2 things give me some seirously bad errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Noooooooooooo, I have a run.bat issue D:

item.title: Noooooooooooo, I have a run.bat issue D:
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Mee0345, post:5, topic:435721”]P[quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538441.msg3939476#msg3939476 date=1331304438]
I’ve been getting this recently too tbh, not too sure why. I’ll literally change 1 thing and it’ll happen even though the code is right. I’m talking, I could change ::agility to ::example leave everything else the same it’ll happen to me so I know its not me… at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:146) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:65) Saving players...
well it says theres an issue in your shophandler.java line 146 and line 45 and server.java line 65
[/quote]
Thanks for stating that its a error about the lines… I immediately went to line 45 which stated to load shops.cfg then I was like, Ill search for 10887 and found it and changed the spaces to TAB[/quote]
Some people don’t know that, I have no idea how skilled you are so please don’t ‘…’ me, okay? So the issue is due to spacing not tabs? Ah ty

Read full topic

well it says theres an issue in your shophandler.java line 146 and line 45 and server.java line 65[/quote]
Thanks for stating that its a error about the lines… I immediately went to line 45 which stated to load shops.cfg then I was like, Ill search for 10887 and found it and changed the spaces to TAB

item.description:

But I don’t know where the hell is the file I change it in? I don’t know where it is! Argh!!!
The only thing with 10887 in ShopHandler.java is

case 10887: return 250;
